headline: Management not trustworthy
pros: Good salary, Benefit plan, and good work life balance. Good place to learn and explore new career options within your field.
cons: Major disconnect between management and employee. No room for mistakes, they will fire you in a heartbeat. Be careful of what you say around people because they might misinterpret you which leads to resentment and termination-lots of gossip.

headline: Receptionists
pros: Nice people, with a good manager
cons: You will be asked to do things outside your job duties and they do not increase your compensation , but this can also give you the chance to learn new things

headline: literally and figuratively screw you
pros: You don't have to work there

headline: office manager
pros: love the original owner, he allowed for advancement thru the years.  had a great benefits package, medcial , dental. vision. short term/long term disability
cons: New owner took over very poor communication skills, not very motivated, talks down to employees when not flirting or being inappropriate

headline: Itern
pros: Great place to work because you had access to all of the traders
cons: too small and dont have a training program. more of a place for older people
